name: PersonaFlow - Advanced AI (RAG + LangGraph + Vector DB)

parameters.query: SELECT id, content, mood, tags, created_at, embedding FROM journal_entries WHERE user_id = '{{ $json.userId }}' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name, category, streak, last_completed, notes FROM habits WHERE user_id = '{{ $json.userId }}' ORDER BY streak DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, created_at, mood, summary, insights, session_type FROM therapy_sessions WHERE user_id = '{{ $json.userId }}' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT content, mood, created_at, tags, (embedding <=> '{{ $json.embedding }}') AS similarity FROM journal_entries WHERE user_id = '{{ $node["Extract & Enrich Data"].json.userId }}' ORDER BY similarity LIMIT 5

parameters.name: journal_analyzer
parameters.description: Analyzes journal entries to identify patterns, mood trends, and emotional insights

parameters.name: habit_tracker
parameters.description: Provides insights on habit streaks, progress, and recommendations

parameters.name: therapy_insights
parameters.description: Retrieves insights from past therapy sessions and identifies recurring themes

parameters.data: ={{ { session_id: $json.sessionId, user_id: $json.userId, role: 'assistant', content: $json.text, source: $json.source, metadata: JSON.stringify($json.contextUsed), created_at: $json.timestamp } }}
